column2:
"To check on the state of her country after the recent turmoil,
Queen Harriet departed on a royal tour around the country."

"Harriet carried out her royal inspection across the country.
And by her side was the Guardian, <%me>."

"And thus, her tour arrived at its final destination in Louisa,
a town standing on the border between Cuent and Es-Ars."

"With its vast lake and abundant natural beauty surrounding it,
it is a famed destination in Cuent for those seeking respite."

"'Louisa's most notable feature is its vast lake. Thanks to the flow of water from
the nearby mountains, and their volcanic activity, the lake surface sometimes
shines with all the colors of the rainbow.'"

"'On clear days it's possible to see Castle Cuent from the lakefront.
The beautiful contrast between the lush green of the forests and the brilliant
shining white of the castle is guaranteed to steal the breath of onlookers.'"
"'Its beauty is beyond even the most fantastical descriptions, begetting a sigh of admiration from all who observe.'"
"Haah..."
"And yet... That sigh sounded completely different from one of admiration."
"Are you that worried about everyone?"
"Something on your mind?"
"Wha-... Oh, not at all! I am not troubled in the slightest, I assure you."
"No, not at all! I am here to relax. Naturally it would be unlikely for there to be anything troubling me, right?"
"We're not blaming you for anything, so there's no need to get so flustered. It's just hard to get your mind off these things, isn't it?"
"I know that I am supposed to be resting at present, but... I apologize, it feels wrong to be doing nothing."
"What I must do now is be strong, hold back my tears, and look forward at the future so that I may make this country... this world into a better place."
"I must accept my role as Queen, no matter what the people may say, and be resolute in achieving my goal."
"Was that what you promised Luther?"
"Why take that all upon yourself?"
"...It is because that is what I was called forth to do here."
"Guardian... I know not how you did it, but you saw the past of my older brother and I, did you not?"
"Otherwise, I cannot imagine how you could have found my brother Luther's hidden research lab."
"Then, the visions that <%me> saw were..."
"It was all the truth."
"I... No, Harriet perished there many years ago."
"I am some other being, given Harriet's form."
"I answered Luther's call, that I might become Harriet."
